articles.title: Mercedes swept up in China Internet furor over model's eyes - The Star Online
articles.description: BEIJING (Bloomberg): Mercedes-Benz removed a video advertisement from a Chinese social media website, state media said, after the clip got swept up in a charged national debate over depictions of Asian-looking features by foreign companies.

articles.content:
